content: Serverless InSpec (AWS) - An AWS Lambda runner for InSpec - convenient scans without having to set up a runner!
Heimdall-tools now supports JFrog Xray, DbProtect, AWS Config, NetSparker, SCC, Snyk and ScoutSuite scan data conversion for viewing in Heimdall!
Heimdall Server supports role-based access, multi-target CAAT export, and more! Follow releases here.
Check back often to find the latest information on InSpec profiles, Heimdall-tool converters, and Heimdall updates!
Automate Manual Controls! SAF/InSpec can now address manual controls! See "Manual Controls" on the Validate page.
Heimdall-lite.cms.gov is live! CMS now has its own version of Heimdall-lite, an in-browser tool for analyzing security data!
Support for viewing AWS Security Hub information in Heimdall
